sentences.en: Forbes as one magazine wrote that the current investment in Chinese stocks is still the best.
sentences.cn: 《福布斯》最新一期杂志撰文指出,目前仍然是投资中国股票的最佳时期.

sentences.en: Forbes list Dives what house they live?
sentences.cn: 福布斯》榜上富豪们都住什么样房子?

sentences.en: Forbes'rankings are skewed toward counties with good school districts.
sentences.cn: 福布斯的排名倾向于那些具有好学区的郡县.

sentences.en: Hello, I m Alan Simmons. I work in the Forbes Parent Company.
sentences.cn: 大家好, 我叫艾伦?西蒙斯. 我在福布斯总公司工作.

sentences.en: His works are invariably accoladed as definitive even as they sparkle and spark ( Malcolm S. Forbes )
sentences.cn: 当他的作品大放光彩时,一直被放在举足轻重的地位 ( 马尔科姆S. 福布斯 )

sentences.en: In 1999, Li KaShing's family was No.10 on Forbes magazine's richest list.
sentences.cn: 1999年, 李嘉诚家族在《福布斯》杂志的富豪榜上名列第十.

sentences.en: Julia: Yeah, I understand. Did you see this article in Forbes?
sentences.cn: 茱莉亚: 是啊, 我了解. 你有看到《富比士杂志》的这篇文章 吗 ?

sentences.en: LH - Forbes has ranked you the 27 th richest men in china, true?
sentences.cn: 财富(福布斯)>>杂志把你列为中国第27个最富有的人, 对 吗 ?

sentences.en: Mr Forbes said: The list changes enormously each year.
sentences.cn: 福布斯先生说: “榜单每年都会有很大变动. ”

sentences.en: Rosanna and Forbes walked in silence for some while.
sentences.cn: 罗莎娜和福布斯默不作声地走了一会儿。

sentences.en: This was the great (? ) Dr. Forbes.
sentences.cn: 这就是伟大的 (? ) 佛比斯博士.

sentences.en: This year, there were 20 new names among the list's top 40 richest people , Forbes said.
sentences.cn: 据《福布斯》介绍, 今年有20位“新人 ” 跻身内地富豪榜前40位.

sentences.en: Unhappily, Forbes could not resist the temptation to make money on the side.
sentences.cn: 不幸, 福布斯禁不住从中谋利.

sentences.en: You can read an article about this company in the number 125 volume of Forbes magazine.
sentences.cn: 你可以在第125期《福布斯》杂志里读到关于该公司的一篇文章.

sentences.en: Zhang was No.5 on Forbes'Chinese mainland list, with $ 1.5 billion in assets.
sentences.cn: 张茵在2006年福布斯中国富豪榜上排名第五, 她的资产价值约15亿美元.

trans.tran_cn: 福布斯（美国著名财经杂志）
